Cell.Data: Have you heard the news? Sean is alive! Keep an eye out for Alexandra, she's trying to track you down...

<player>, Sean is alive! I have definitive proof, but we're dealing with some shady characters. I know she has been quite dismissive of you and your work with us in the past, but in fact, %evil_kath% communicated to me that she is deserting Schokolade Weltreich and betraying her co-workers to help us find my husband. Kath has fled to the %falklands% in hiding, and that is where you will find her. Now, if you listen closely to me for a second...

Bring %evil_kath% [D|25|100|250] cases each of %b12%, %c10%, %i12%, %t11%, %m07% and %e12% at the %falklands%. Don't get me wrong, that is a long list of confections, but the sooner we get them to Kath, the better. She'll need to use those to help her escape from that toxic company of hers. Ready, <player>?
Bring a long list of confections - [D|25|100|250] cases each - to %evil_kath% in %falklands%.

<player>, this has been a long time coming. To be honest with you, I have always admired your business acumen, as well as your abilities in the test kitchen. What can I say, you're impressive. I've spent too much time under Schokolade Weltreich, and I've been blind to just how much wanton greed and defamation of other companies meant to them. All I can do now is apologize, and try to make it up to you all now.

Now, I don't mean to offend you and what you've done, but I want you to get out of here before that snake of a man called %evil_wolf% sees that you and Alex came here.

You need to go see %bel_hutkeep% at %belize%. She'll be able to tell you where to find Sean.
I'm prepared to double-cross my people, <player>, but it will cost you. There is a long list of confections I'm expecting you to deliver to me here.

Oh yes, the American? I know exactly where he is - he is with a remote tribe deep in the highlands. I can fetch him for you, but it will not be cheap. If you are willing and able to pay me [D|$1,000,000|$10,000,000|$50,000,000] up front to cover all of my expenses, I can guarantee you that I will deliver Sean to you here.
You need to come back when you've got enough cash to pay me - I need [D|$1,000,000|$10,000,000|$50,000,000] up front to cover all of my costs to free Sean and bring him back to you here.
I see you have the cash. Shall I take my [D|$1,000,000|$10,000,000|$50,000,000] fee now, and guarantee Sean's safe return?
OK. I will need about 3 months for the round trip journey. I will send word once I have the American safely with me.
<player>, have you heard the incredible news? Sean has been found - alive! You absolutely must get to %belize% immediately!
Get to %belize% as soon as you can!
Did you doubt me, <player>? I certainly hope not - I have honored my commitment to you. Here, I trust, is the person you've been looking for...

<player>, I never gave up. I knew that some day, some way, my true love would find me. After being shot down, I was captured by the Germans. As luck would have it, the officer in charge of the POW camp where I was held was none other than %evil_wolf% - that's right, our old nemesis!

I have no idea why he didn't just kill me, but as the war was drawing to a close, he hatched a crafty plan. Squirreling me away with a remote highlands tribe in Central America, Wolf assumed that with Alex distracted looking for me, Baumeister Confections would fall apart. I guess he didn't count on you, <player>!

I myself have been keeping busy by helping the tribe learn to cultivate cacao. Their crop is incredible - you won't find finer cacao anywhere in the world. And I have now set %bel_hutkeep% up here with a market to sell the ingredient, so you'll know where to find it.
Now I am to depart to finally go meet Alex in %zurich% - you must come see us there soon!

<player>, you have accomplished an incredible amount. You control all of our factories, and have taken ownership of multiple retail locations bringing in additional revenues through special orders. Your creations have won awards and new customers the world over. This is not even to mention all that you have done for me personally...

There is only one thing left for you to do, something that used to be a lot easier. In the old days, you would have achieved this rank a long time ago, but nowadays this distinction doesn't come as easily as it once did.

We are prepared to submit your application to the International Society of Artisan Confectioners - that's right, <player>, we're prepared to nominate you to be designated a %rank_5%. First, I'll give you the final space in the recipe book - once you create your last recipe, the recipe book will be complete.

To support your case, we're going to need a heck of a lot of sweets. We need you to deliver [D|200|500|1,000] cases of each and every one of your recipes - from <user1> right up through the last recipe you still need to create - to %main_evan% at %san_bchq%. We'll collect them in two batches, and then submit all of those confections with your application.
For the first batch, bring [D|200|500|1,000] cases each of <user1>, <user2>, <user3>, <user4>, <user5> and <user6> to %san_bchq%. You'll also need to create that final recipe.
Bring [D|200|500|1,000] cases of each of your first six creations to %san_bchq%.
For the first batch we need [D|200|500|1,000] cases of each of your first six creations, <player>, and you'll also need to create your final recipe.

So far, so good, <player>. Now, for the second batch we'll need [D|200|500|1,000] cases each of <user7>, <user8>, <user9>, <user10>, <user11> and <user12>. After that, your application package will be complete.
Bring [D|200|500|1,000] cases of each of your final six creations to %san_bchq%.
<player>, for the second batch we need [D|200|500|1,000] cases of each of your final six creations, <player>. Then we'll be ready to get your application for %rank_5% into the appropriate parties...

Excellent. We now have everything we need. We'll submit your application immediately, and we should have an answer back in about a month.

In the meantime, you keep up the great work!

, I am here on behalf of the Board of Directors, and I have some wonderful news. Your candidacy has been approved! That's right, you are now a %rank_5%! Congratulations!!

You may continue to work to grow the business if you wish, and of course special orders will also help bump up our profits over time.

Speaking of profits, I don't know if you realized this, but the award of %rank_5% comes with a significant cash bonus - I am most pleased to credit your account with the [D|$10,000,000|$25,000,000|$100,000,000] we received for you having earned this distinction.

My hat is off to you, , you truly are a %rank_5%!
I can't thank you enough for all you have done, <player>, not only for the business, but for me personally as well. I knew the day we met, that you were the right candidate for the job.

Oh, so you've helped with funding a private search for Sean in Central America? That takes guts. And a whole lot of cash. I just... I hope they find him after all these years.

Keep me posted, will you? Godspeed.

I heard the news! I can hardly believe it. Sean's alive and back with Alex in ZÃ¼rich. You actually did it! Listen, I know he's got a lot of catching up to do, but... could you do me a favor? I've written him a letter. Nothing formal, just... things you say to a friend you thought you'd lost forever. Could you deliver it to him at the %zur_mountain% in %zurich%? I'd be eternally grateful.
Deliver %tok_mountainkeep%'s letter to %main_sean% at the %zur_mountain% in %zurich%.
A letter from... Tom Hardy? Well, I'll be. Let me have a read at that.

Oh, he always was a sentimental old coot. I can't believe he remembered that story about the busted landing gear in '43. We have so much catching up to do after we flew together!

Thank you for bringing this to me, . It means more than you know to hear from him. I wanted to give some of my own stock of %bel_cacao% for your trouble. Make something really nice with it, my friend!

It's amazing news that %main_sean% is alive and accounted for, but I know he's missing out on hearing from his coworkers again from WWII. And he'd love to receive that letter you've got on hand from %tok_mountainkeep%. You can find Sean at the %zur_mountain% in %zurich%.
